plugins.prepareCmd: sed -i "s/scrypt@[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\+/scrypt@${nextRelease.version}/g" README.md && sed -i "s/\"version\": \"[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\"/\"version\": \"${nextRelease.version}\"/" deno.jsonc && sed -i "s/[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]/${nextRelease.version}/" egg.json && sed -i "s/v[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]/v${nextRelease.version}/" lib/scrypt_bench.ts && sed -i "s/@version [[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]\+\.[[:digit:]]/@version ${nextRelease.version}/" mod.ts
